Ward {2C} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2C}.)[/i]
[i]Finale [/i]– Whenever Backup Singer or another enchantment is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
notes: Note, Ensorceler: i think aura moving around is not very valuable if you dont have extremely fine control of when it happens, which finale is not
